name: Find the cubs
description:
In Find the cubs you need to find your 5 cubs! They are hidden around the maps. The calm music helps you find the cubs.

The Story

You lost your cubs in the forest and you need to find them. You have long road to find them all but you can do this. When you find the all cubs you can live your life normal again with the cubs.

Features

  • Cool music
  • Amazing Graphics
  • Nice controls
  • Raccoon
  • Raccoon Cubs
  • Climbing

Controls

  • W=Forward
  • S=Backwards
  • D=right
  • C=Crouch
  • A=Left
  • Space=Jump
